casebody.data:
FOSTER-LONG
v.
DURHAM COUNTY. No. 303P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Dawn Dillon Raynor, Jennifer T. Gottsegen, Raleigh, for Durham County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of June 2006 by Plaintiff for Sanctions:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
